name: Pink Watercolor Floral Tumblr Dashboard
description: This simple tumblr dashboard features a repeating image option between watercolor roses and cherry blossom branches that will work on any resolution or screen size, a pink gradient content box that disappears as you scroll, four different tumblr logos to choose from, watercolor rose post icons that lift on hover, and a pink background/less opaque text upon hovering over any text on this theme. If you need something adjusted, customized, or have any other questions or concerns, feel free to contact me @eatyourheirs.
